result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
result.translation: (19) But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.[1928]
result.footnotes: [1928]- Or "the companions of ill fortune," i.e., those who receive their records in their left hands and proceed to Hell.
